languages.text: "Но я правда ни при чем, господин! Все, что мне велели — развлечь звездных гостей и сопроводить в замок для беседы. А вместо этого — вокруг лишь кровь да смерть!"

traits.locale_text: "Но я правда ни при чем, господин! Все, что мне велели — развлечь звездных гостей и сопроводить в замок для беседы. А вместо этого — вокруг лишь кровь да смерть!"

languages.text: "But I really had nothing to do with any of it, my lord! All I was told to do was entertain our celestial guests and chaperone them to the castle for talks. And instead, there's just gore and death everywhere!"
languages.original_text: "Но я правда ни при чем, господин! Все, что мне велели — развлечь звездных гостей и сопроводить в замок для беседы. А вместо этого — вокруг лишь кровь да смерть!"

traits.locale_text: "But I really have nothing to do with any of it, my lord! All I was told to do was entertain our celestial guests and chaperone them to the castle for talks. And instead, there's just gore and death everywhere!"

"But I really had nothing to do with any of it, my lord! All I was told to do was entertain our celestial guests and chaperone them to the castle for talks. And instead, there's just gore and death everywhere!"

languages.text: 「ですが裁判官様、本当に私は何も関わっていないのです！私はただ、天のお客人をおもてなして、お城までお連れして会談に同席するよう言われただけなのです。それなのに、あたり一面が血と死体だらけだなんて…！」
languages.original_text: "But I really had nothing to do with any of it, my lord! All I was told to do was entertain our celestial guests and chaperone them to the castle for talks. And instead, there's just gore and death everywhere!"

traits.locale_text: 「ですが裁判官様、本当に私は何も関わっていないのです！私はただ、天のお客人をおもてなして、お城までお連れして会談に同席するよう言われただけなのです。それなのに、あたり一面が血と死体だらけだなんて…！」

languages.text: "Fakat gerçekten de olanlarla bir ilgim yoktu lordum! Bana sadece semavi misafirlerimizi eğlendirmem ve görüşmeler için kaleye götürmem söylendi. Fakat ortalığı vahşet ve kan bürümüş!"
languages.original_text: "But I really had nothing to do with any of it, my lord! All I was told to do was entertain our celestial guests and chaperone them to the castle for talks. And instead, there's just gore and death everywhere!"

traits.locale_text: "Fakat gerçekten de olanlarla bir ilgim yoktu lordum! Bana sadece semavi misafirlerimizi eğlendirmem ve görüşmeler için kaleye götürmem söylendi. Fakat ortalığı vahşet ve kan bürümüş!

languages.text: «Pero ¡de verdad no tuve relación alguna con ello, mi señor! Lo único que me ordenaron fue entretener a nuestros invitados celestiales y conducirlos al castillo para las conversaciones. ¡En lugar de eso, solo hay sangre y muerte por todas partes!».
languages.original_text: "But I really had nothing to do with any of it, my lord! All I was told to do was entertain our celestial guests and chaperone them to the castle for talks. And instead, there's just gore and death everywhere!"

traits.locale_text: «Pero ¡de verdad no tuve relación alguna con ello, mi señor! Lo único que me ordenaron fue entretener a nuestros invitados celestiales y conducirlos al castillo para las conversaciones. ¡En lugar de eso, solo hay sangre y muerte por todas partes!».

languages.text: “可这一切真的和我一点关系都没有，大人！他们告诉我，说要我好好招待来自上界的客人们，陪同他们前往城堡进行会谈。可结果呢？到处都是鲜血与死亡！”
languages.original_text: "But I really had nothing to do with any of it, my lord! All I was told to do was entertain our celestial guests and chaperone them to the castle for talks. And instead, there's just gore and death everywhere!"

traits.locale_text: “可这一切真的和我一点关系都没有，大人！他们告诉我，说要我好好招待来自上界的客人们，陪同他们前往城堡进行会谈。可结果呢？到处都是鲜血与死亡！”

languages.text: « Mais je vous assure que je n'ai strictement rien à voir là-dedans, mon seigneur ! On m'a simplement ordonné de divertir nos hôtes célestes et de les escorter jusqu'au château en vue des pourparlers. Et au lieu de ça, partout où nous allons, il ne reste plus qu'un sillage de sang et de mort ! »
languages.original_text: "But I really had nothing to do with any of it, my lord! All I was told to do was entertain our celestial guests and chaperone them to the castle for talks. And instead, there's just gore and death everywhere!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais je vous assure que je n'ai strictement rien à voir là-dedans, mon seigneur ! On m'a simplement ordonné de divertir nos hôtes célestes et de les escorter jusqu'au château en vue des pourparlers. Et au lieu de ça, partout où nous allons, il ne reste plus qu'un sillage de sang et de mort ! »

languages.text: "Aber ich hatte mit all dem wirklich nichts zu tun, {mf|Herr|Herrin}! Ich sollte lediglich unsere himmlischen Gäste unterhalten und sie zu Gesprächen zur Burg begleiten. Und nun ist plötzlich überall Blut und Tod."
languages.original_text: "But I really had nothing to do with any of it, my lord! All I was told to do was entertain our celestial guests and chaperone them to the castle for talks. And instead, there's just gore and death everywhere!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich hatte mit all dem wirklich nichts zu tun, {mf|Herr|Herrin}! Ich sollte lediglich unsere himmlischen Gäste unterhalten und sie zu Gesprächen zur Burg begleiten. Und nun ist plötzlich überall Blut und Tod."
